mapper.insert: insert into plan(num, grp_name, leader) values(#{num}, #{grp_name}, #{leader})
mapper.select: select b.num, grp_name, leader from plan_member a join plan b on a.grp_num = b.num where id = #{id} order by grp_num desc
select num, title, thumbnail, lng, lat from tourist_spot where t_category = #{t_category} order by num asc
select num, title, thumbnail, lng, lat from tourist_spot where title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') and t_category = #{t_category} order by num asc
